q1: What types of data can I generate?
a1: You can generate four types: Users (name, email, age, city), Products (name, category, price, stock), Orders (customer, product, quantity, status), and Posts (title, author, likes, date).
q2: How many rows can I generate?
a2: You can generate between 1 and 200 rows per dataset.
a3: You can export as CSV (for spreadsheets) or JSON (for applications and APIs).
a4: Yes, the data uses realistic names, email formats, price ranges, and other contextual values.
